display_information.name: Send to Intercom
display_information.description: Create a support ticket in Intercom directly from Slack.
display_information.long_description: Open a ticket in Intercom from a Slack thread or channel. Call the bot via @ mention to start the ticket creation process. After providing basic details via popup form, a new ticket will be opened and the bot will respond with the ticket ID and URL. Built by Harper for Wistia Support.
